intro.description: This tutorial guides you through the creation of a JDBC Data Adapter, which allows you to create and run a report using a database.

item.title: Show the repository view
item.description: Select Window > Show View > Other... at the top of Eclipse. In Jaspersoft Studio category, select Repository and press OK. This will show the repository view.

item.title: Configure a Data Adapter
item.description: To create a new Data Adapter, right click the Data Adapters node and select Create Data Adapter. Select Database JDBC Connection and press Next.

item.title: Launch the JDBC datasource editor
item.description: Set the correct JDBC driver name. You will have to add the jar(s) of the driver in order to be able to connect to your database. When done, press Test to test your connection.
